name: The Moonstone Equation
description: Help Alice find some answers as she joins a unique bunch of scientists, oddballs and theorists at a remote hilltop research facility to investigate some puzzling stone carvings. A single player puzzle/platform game about science and curiosity presented in a modern pixel art style.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.1 ghz or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 440 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 300 MB available space
